the part of a two-part phone that you hold near to your ear

a piece of equipment that you wear in or near your ear, that makes it possible for you to hear a recording or hear someone talking to you: Through an earpiece the actor heard directions on how to move. Earpieces have been installed in players' helmets to allow communication from the coaches.
